attributes.action: Move prostitutes from Yarm road to industrial estate and crack down on punters
attributes.additional_details: In the past I have seen them stood on the street corners at 12pm taking my daughter to nursery. I understand they are going to do it, I just don't think they should be able to do it in a residential area. I feel unsafe walking on Yarm road past 5pm, and have seen/heard so many vicious fights, so has my daughter. This needs to stop.
attributes.background: I live just off Yarm Road in Stockton on Tees,  and I am sick to death of the amount of working girls on Yarm road. My husband cannot go to the local shop in his car or works van without being approached, even when my 5 year old is in car with him.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local police and your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
